movie_title: How fans talk about their passions ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Fandom is more than simply being a fan, and now the world of fandom has started to develop its own l

vocabulary.definition: a community of people who share a love for the same thing and create a whole culture around it
vocabulary.example: The Harry Potter fandom organizes events and discussions for fans to connect and share their love for the series.

vocabulary.definition: odd or unusual in an interesting way
vocabulary.example: Her quirky fashion sense always stands out in a crowd.

vocabulary.definition: to insult and laugh at someone in an unkind way
vocabulary.example: It's not nice to mock others for their hobbies or interests.

vocabulary.definition: acronym for 'Basking in Reflected Glory', feeling good about oneself when the team one supports wins
vocabulary.example: After their team's victory, the fans were BIRGing in the celebrations.

vocabulary.definition: acronym for 'Cutting Off Reflected Failure', distancing oneself from the team one supports when they lose
vocabulary.example: Instead of celebrating with other fans, he was CORFing after the team's defeat.

vocabulary.definition: participation in exciting group activities or celebrations to feel part of a collective success
vocabulary.example: The supporters rushed to the stadium to be part of the action after the team's championship win.
